input.sentences: the officer arrives on the scene of a car accident .
the police officer approaches the damaged vehicle .
it looks as though the car had been rear ended as the majority of damage is located at the rear driver 's side tail light .
there is more damage near the driver 's side panel .
the passenger in the damaged vehicle exits the car .
output.sentences: The officer arrived at the scene of a wreck.
He approached the vehicle to survey the damage while pointing out the debris that littered the ground.
Most of the damage to the wrecked vehicle appeared to be in the rear.
With the driver still seated behind the wheel, damage to the back passenger side caused a dent in the frame of the car.
Finally, the passenger and driver exited the vehicle seemingly uninjured.
